alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Richland, southern Huron, eastern Marion, northwestern Ashland, Morrow, eastern Crawford and central Knox Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from New Washington to near Cardington. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Mount Vernon, Mount Gilead, Galion, Shelby, Willard, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Fredericktown, New London, Gambier, Utica, Cardington, Bellville, Plymouth, Centerburg, Ashley and New Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland
